text: Bonningues-lès-Calais () is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A farming village located 5 miles (10 km) southwest of Calais, on the D243 road near to junction 39 of the A16 autoroute. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Pierre, dating from the twelfth century. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * Bonningues-lès-Calais on the Quid website Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais Category:Pale of Calais
title: Bonningues-lès-Calais
